description: LEFV Small Bottles Transparent Mini Glass Jars with Cork Stoppers Top - Message Weddings Wish Jewelry Pendant Charms Kit Party Favors - Clear blown glass mini treasure bottles. These cute miniature glass bottles are great keepers and decorations for all kinds of little items: interchangeable pendant art, message in a bottle charms, keepsake charms, momentos, altered art, travel treasures, more! Make your own message in a bottle charms and altered art pendants! Or store your seed and beads with ease! Roll up your favorite art snippet, photo, wrapping paper, postcard, magazine clipping, laser-printed messages or other paper items - insert into bottle for instant 3-D art. Store your seed and beads, or make message in a bottle projects, insert entire small flowers, or dried flower petals, fill with clear epoxy for a permanent real flower pendant, or refill with fresh flowers to match your outfit, or sand from your favorite beach ....and so on!
